root.name: Ninja Golf
root.description: OverviewNinja Golf is a hybrid of arcade action and golf simulation developed by BlueSky and released in 1990 for the Atari 7800 by Atari. Players control a ninja, whose must play nine holes of golf while fighting mud-slinging gophers, egg-dropping birds, killer sharks, scorpions, giant mutant frogs, and other ninjas. The only other released game to blend golf with action gameplay was Aqua Teen Hunger Force: Zombie Ninja Pro-Am, released almost two decades later.

similar_games.game: Aqua Teen Hunger Force: Zombie Ninja Pro-Am
